title: Ep 165: Redness, Rosacea, Face Dandruff & All the Weird Stuff
itunes:title: Ep 165: Redness, Rosacea, Face Dandruff & All the Weird Stuff
itunes:subtitle: Dr. Francesca Fusco teaches you how to "search and destroy" all your skin issues (redness, rosacea, angiomas, seborrheic dermatitis) and shares her favorite skin rejuvenators, like PDO thread lifts and the product one of her...
description:
Dr. Francesca Fusco teaches you how to "search and destroy" all your skin issues (redness, rosacea, angiomas, seborrheic dermatitis) and shares her favorite skin rejuvenators, like PDO thread lifts and the product one of her patients calls "Jesus in a bottle." Before that, we discuss solutions for dry toenails, the disappearance of the world's frankincense, and California's law banning discrimination based on one's hairstyle.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
